title: ErrorbasedSQL
extract: SQL injection is a subset of the “code injection” attack method. SQL stands for Structured Query Language and is used by databases to store and retrieve information. ... However, if the developer fails to validate user input, a malicious user or other attacker can pass SQL statements directly to the database.Sep 21, 2015
extract_html: SQL injection is a subset of the “code injection” attack method. SQL stands for Structured Query Language and is used by databases to store and retrieve information. ... However, if the developer fails to validate user input, a malicious user or other attacker can pass SQL statements directly to the database.Sep 21, 2015
